entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
